001package com.fns.grivet.config;
002
003import org.springframework.context.annotation.Bean;
004import org.springframework.context.annotation.Configuration;
005import org.springframework.context.annotation.Profile;
006import org.springframework.core.annotation.Order;
007import org.springframework.security.access.hierarchicalroles.RoleHierarchyImpl;
008import org.springframework.security.config.annotation.method.configuration.EnableMethodSecurity;
009import org.springframework.security.config.annotation.web.builders.HttpSecurity;
010import org.springframework.security.config.annotation.web.configuration.EnableWebSecurity;
011import org.springframework.security.config.annotation.web.configuration.WebSecurityConfiguration;
012import org.springframework.security.web.SecurityFilterChain;
013import org.springframework.security.web.access.expression.DefaultWebSecurityExpressionHandler;
014
015import com.okta.spring.boot.oauth.Okta;
016
017@Profile("secure")
018@EnableWebSecurity
019@Configuration
020public class WebSecurityConfig {
021
022    @Bean
023    SecurityFilterChain filterChain(HttpSecurity http) throws Exception {
024
025        http.authorizeRequests()
026                // allow anonymous access to the root page
027                .requestMatchers("/").permitAll()
028                // all other requests
029                .anyRequest().authenticated()
030                .and()
031                .oauth2ResourceServer().jwt(); // replace .jwt() with .opaqueToken() for Opaque Token case
032
033        // Send a 401 message to the browser (w/o this, you'll see a blank page)
034        Okta.configureResourceServer401ResponseBody(http);
035        return http.build();
036    }
037}
